titleStmt.title: Digital Edition of Glaser Abklatsch ID: AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-A-GL1546a
AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-A-GL1546a

encodingDesc.p: The original encoding was done in plain text files following the encoding quidelines of the Morgenländische Gesellschaft. With a dedicated web application these plain text files were transformed into XML documents validating (partially) against the Epidoc-Schema and those XML-Documents have been further sematically annotaded.
In order to avoid well known xml-issues especially in regards of overlapping elements the actual edited/annotated text was multiplied in several anonymos blocks, each block providing specific markup.

rn hqny ʾlmqh ṯh=

rʾhw b-kl ʾʾrḫ ystydʿ=

ngt ṣdqm w-l ḫryn-hmw bn
bʾstm b-ʿṯtr w-ʾlmqh

1.ʿAbdmaraʾhū, the [cl]ient of Dhū-Mi= 2.rrān, has dedicated to ʾĪlmuquh Thah= 3.wān and Thawr Baʿlum, lord of Ḥarwā= 4.num (this) statue which he had promised him for the well-being 5.of his son Saʿdʾawwām. And may 6.ʾĪlmuquh continue to grant his servant ʿAbdma= 7.raʾhū all the things which he might seek 8.of him. And may he grant him prosperity and 9.[g]ood fortune. And may he keep them safe [from] 10.any harm. By ʿAthtar and by ʾĪlmuqu[h].

ʿAbdmaraʾhū, the client of Dhū-Mi=
rrān, has dedicated to ʾĪlmuquh Thah=
wān and Thawr Baʿlum, lord of Ḥarwā=
num this statue which he had promised him for the well-being
of his son Saʿdʾawwām. And may
ʾĪlmuquh continue to grant his servant ʿAbdma=
raʾhū all the things which he might seek
of him. And may he grant him prosperity and
good fortune. And may he keep them safe from
any harm. By ʿAthtar and by ʾĪlmuquh.
